Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util

Class PluginBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.util.PluginBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder<Object>
public class PluginBuilder extends Object implements Builder<Object>
Builder class to instantiate and configure a Plugin object using a PluginFactory method or PluginBuilderFactory builder class.
